name: Cage of Rings
description:
Your memory is the key to the cages of rings. The cages that bound strange but cute creatures.

Each ring of the cage has symbols of different colors. To free the poor fellows, you need to memorize the location of the symbols in the allotted time.

As time passes, the ill-fated rings will spin to confuse you.

Your task is to rotate the rings so that the symbols return to their places.

Having guessed all the rings, the cage will be open, and the creature will become free and happy!

But remember, with every creature you save, the difficulty of the cages will increase.

May memory be with you!
